price: Ԑberε a wͻn teaseεnam adwadi kuo no sii mu no, wͻn papa (Ya’aquub) kaa sε: “Mate Yosef ho pampan, sε mommu me sε nkͻkoraa-sεm (bi na meredie) a”
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
